WRITING.TEXT: Most of the time you're hit by a GB while the revenge animation is still playing and then hit by shoves and bashes and kicks over and over making you unable to move at all. The uninterruptable only works as long as the armor is up and doesn't stop blunt hits. I don't mean just leaving everyone or using a feat to win. I mean literally killing them with your moves. I haven't seen it happen in a 3 or 4 v 1 since the nerf. Like shit, even trying to do a zone, heavy, or dodge to bash someone down still gets you hit by a GB. You just get stuck.
I'm not saying it should be a win. It doesn't even give you a chance any more. You live 1 second longer, and that's it. All I am saying is you should get a chance.
I feel like its good how it is for 2v1. Like it evens it out so if you outplay them you can win. 3v1 or 4v1 is impossible because if all the interrupts from all directions.

One change could be having the Revenge effects scale depending on how many are fighting you similar to how you gain it faster. For example (Just for example purposes, not saying this is good) 1v1 has no Revenge gained. 2v1 is Revenge buff normal, 100%. 3v1 is Revenge buff increased, 200%. 4v1 Revenge is even more buffed 400%. Coupled with changing how blunt (bash, shove) attacks affect Revengers it might be alright.

WRITING.TITLE: Revenge Needs Buff
WRITING.TEXT: At least in more than 2v1, the nerf coupled with the new gear changes has made Revenge mode unviable when outnumbered. It really needs some sort of change, revert the nerf, or something new. It just doesn't make an impact except for living maybe 1 second longer.
